name: pastina
content:

pasta that consists of very small pieces, often served in a kind of thin soup: They both love pastina in chicken broth. You can substitute the couscous with rice or pastina. The deli serves pastina salads that are vegetarian.
More examplesFewer examplesPastina is small pasta for soup.We made a dinner of chicken stock, sweated spring onions, cayenne pepper, and pastina.Her chicken-broth based soup has cavolo nero and pastina, the tiny star-shaped pasta.The recipe uses alphabet pastina.
